import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Flight } from '../flight'; @Component({ selector: 'app-flight', templateUrl: './flight.component.html', styleUrls: ['./flight.component.css'] }) export class FlightComponent implements OnInit{ flights : Flight[]; constructor() {this.flights=[]} ngOnInit(): void { } }
